sentences.english: Yuan Hong, "In the history of transmission of the hing, so pass ancient and modern and Benedict Norm."
sentences.chinese: 袁宏提出，“史傳之興，所以通古今而篤名教”。

sentences.english: As we all know, GuoYu is a masterpiece of biographically historic literature about Pre-Qin period.
sentences.chinese: 《國語》是先秦時期一部史傳文學名著。

sentences.english: Its art origin is Historical-literature and Talk-art.
sentences.chinese: 其藝術淵源是史傳文學和說話藝術。

sentences.english: The criteria for its literary criticism are respectively based on two perspectives: collection of historical materials and compilation of historical biographies.
sentences.chinese: 其立論標準，分別基於史料採集與史傳編著兩個視角。
